properties.name: preferFrontCamera
properties.description: Prefer front camera. Supported on iOS and Android.

properties.name: showFlipCameraButton
properties.description: Show flip camera button. Supported on iOS and Android.

properties.name: showTorchButton
properties.description: Show torch button. Supported on iOS and Android.

properties.name: disableAnimations
properties.description: Disable animations. Supported on iOS only.

properties.name: disableSuccessBeep
properties.description: Disable success beep. Supported on iOS only.

properties.name: prompt
properties.description: Prompt text. Supported on Android only.

properties.name: formats
properties.description: Formats separated by commas. Defaults to all formats except `PDF_417` and `RSS_EXPANDED`.

properties.name: orientation
properties.description: Orientation. Supported on Android only. Can be set to `portrait` or `landscape`. Defaults to none so the user can rotate the phone and pick an orientation.

properties.name: torchOn
properties.description: Launch with the torch switched on (if available). Supported on Android only.

properties.name: resultDisplayDuration
properties.description: Display scanned text for X ms. 0 suppresses it entirely, default 1500. Supported on Android only.
